It may not be Vietnam, but things aren't looking pretty.
 BAGHDAD, Iraq (CNN) -- Shiites angry over the arrest of a top cleric's deputy stormed through a Baghdad neighborhood Sunday, killing seven U.S. troops, wounding dozens more and taking over buildings, coalition officials said
 
 Isn't it ironic to anyone else, the Shiites that have clearly been more on the U.S. side and construction of a new government, are now turning against their American occupiers. I feel as though every time our administration brags that things are getting better in Iraq, things take a swift dive, as they did a few weeks ago. I think we should support our troops there as much as we can, but someone needs to help reform Bush's plan for the vision of Iraq because his incompetence is clearly shining through.
 
 Remi
 Check at my new site at poeticinjustice.net, I have a forums page as well
